name: 4th Year Major Project
description:
This was my major project for my 4th year in music college.

Basically, this project revolved around making video game music with different integration and interactivity methods AND what were the methods effects on my compostional process.

All the music is original and made be me. The game is a Unity example game I got on the Unity Learn site, so I did not make this game. The game is called "The Explorer". The foley/SFX are also from the Unity game, not made by me.

(This upload is purely for portfolio purposes)
